original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 824: Gratuitous Navel Gazing
original_content:
This week, Jonathan Bennett chats with Doc Searls about SCaLE and Personal AI! Whats the vision of an AI that consumers run themselves, what form factor might that take, and how do we get there?


https://www.kwaai.ai/
https://blog.cryptographyengineering.com/2025/02/23/three-questions-about-apple-encryption-and-the-u-k/


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.
